## [Research Interests]{style="color: #990000"}

<font size=3>

-   To clarify the genetic perspective on multiple clinical symptoms of common mental illnesses, particularly depression, and their underlying biological mechanisms.

-   To identify potential risk factors and objective biomarkers for the diverse clinical symptoms of depression, using multi-omics data and cutting-edge genetic statistical methods, ultimately with the goal of optimizing diagnosis and treatment.

</font>
